translations: n．斑点，斑纹：通常指动物皮毛或物体表面上的不规则斑点。
· The horse has dapples on its coat.
这匹马的皮毛上有斑点。
v．使呈斑驳，使成斑纹：在物体表面产生斑点或斑纹。
· The sunlight dapples the forest floor.
阳光在森林地面上形成斑驳的光影。

sentences.sentence: Dapples and greys, pintos and bays, all the pretty little horses.
sentences.translation: 花斑和灰色，花斑马和海湾，所有漂亮的小木马。

sentences.sentence: More sparkled in dapples all over the cases of booze, supplies, and beer kegs.
sentences.translation: 更在全情形的斑纹中闪耀豪饮，供应，和啤酒小桶。
